verses.verse: Then Job <S%H347><s%> responded, <S%H6030><s%> <S%H559><s%>
"Truly <S%H551><s%> then <S%H3588><s%> you are the people, <S%H5971><s%> And with you wisdom <S%H2451><s%> will die! <S%H4191><s%>

"But I have intelligence <S%H3824><s%> as well <S%H1571><s%> as you; I am not inferior <S%H5307><s%> to you. And who <S%H4310><s%> does not know <S%H854><s%> such <S%H3644><s%> things as these <S%H428><s%>?

"I am <S%H1961><s%> a joke <S%H7814><s%> to my friends. <S%H7453><s%> The one who called <S%H7121><s%> on God, <S%H433><s%> and He answered <S%H6030><s%> him; The just <S%H6662><s%> [and] blameless <S%H8549><s%> [man] is a joke. <S%H7814><s%>
"He who is at ease <S%H7600><s%> holds <S%H6248><s%> calamity <S%H6365><s%> in contempt, <S%H937><s%> As prepared <S%H3559><s%> for those whose feet <S%H7272><s%> slip. <S%H4571><s%>

"The tents <S%H168><s%> of the destroyers <S%H7703><s%> prosper, <S%H7951><s%> And those who provoke <S%H7264><s%> God <S%H410><s%> are secure, <S%H987><s%> Whom <S%H834><s%> God <S%H433><s%> brings <S%H935><s%> into their power. <S%H3027><s%>
"But now <S%H4994><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> the beasts, <S%H929><s%> and let them teach <S%H3384><s%> you; And the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and let them tell <S%H5046><s%> you.
"Or <S%H176><s%> speak <S%H7878><s%> to the earth, <S%H776><s%> and let it teach <S%H3384><s%> you; And let the fish <S%H1709><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> declare <S%H5608><s%> to you.
"Who <S%H4310><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> does not know <S%H3045><s%> That the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> this, <S%H384><s%>

In whose <S%H834><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> is the life <S%H5315><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> thing, <S%H2416><s%> And the breath <S%H7307><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> mankind <S%H376><s%> <S%H1320><s%>?
"Does not the ear <S%H241><s%> test <S%H974><s%> words, <S%H4405><s%> As the palate <S%H2441><s%> tastes <S%H2938><s%> its food <S%H400><s%>?
"Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is with aged <S%H3453><s%> men, <S%H3453><s%> [With] long <S%H753><s%> life <S%H3117><s%> is understanding. <S%H8394><s%>
"With Him are wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and might; <S%H1369><s%> To Him belong counsel <S%H6098><s%> and understanding. <S%H8394><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> He tears <S%H2040><s%> down, <S%H2040><s%> and it cannot <S%H3808><s%> be rebuilt; <S%H1129><s%> He imprisons <S%H5462><s%> a man, <S%H376><s%> and there can be no <S%H3808><s%> release. <S%H6605><s%>
"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> He restrains <S%H6113><s%> the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and they dry <S%H3001><s%> up; And He sends <S%H7971><s%> them out, and they inundate <S%H2015><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
"With Him are strength <S%H5797><s%> and sound <S%H8454><s%> wisdom, <S%H8454><s%> The misled <S%H7683><s%> and the misleader <S%H7686><s%> belong to Him.
"He makes counselors <S%H3289><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> barefoot, <S%H7758><s%> And makes <S%H1984><s%> fools <S%H1984><s%> of judges. <S%H8199><s%>
"He loosens <S%H6605><s%> the bond <S%H4147><s%> of kings, <S%H4428><s%> And binds <S%H631><s%> their loins <S%H4975><s%> with a girdle. <S%H232><s%>
"He makes priests <S%H3548><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> barefoot, <S%H7758><s%> And overthrows <S%H5557><s%> the secure <S%H386><s%> ones. <S%H386><s%>
"He deprives <S%H5493><s%> the trusted <S%H539><s%> ones of speech, <S%H8193><s%> And takes <S%H3947><s%> away the discernment <S%H2940><s%> of the elders. <S%H2205><s%>
"He pours <S%H8210><s%> contempt <S%H937><s%> on nobles, <S%H5081><s%> And loosens <S%H7503><s%> the belt <S%H4206><s%> of the strong. <S%H650><s%>
"He reveals <S%H1540><s%> mysteries <S%H6013><s%> from the darkness, <S%H2822><s%> And brings <S%H3318><s%> the deep <S%H6757><s%> darkness <S%H6757><s%> into light. <S%H216><s%>
"He makes <S%H7679><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> great, <S%H7679><s%> then destroys them; He enlarges <S%H6><s%> the nations, <S%H7849><s%> then leads <S%H1471><s%> them away.

"He deprives <S%H5493><s%> of intelligence <S%H3820><s%> the chiefs <S%H7218><s%> of the earth's people, <S%H5971><s%> And makes them wander <S%H8582><s%> in a pathless <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1870><s%> waste. <S%H8414><s%>
"They grope <S%H4959><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%> with no <S%H3808><s%> light, <S%H216><s%> And He makes them stagger <S%H8582><s%> like a drunken <S%H7910><s%> man. <S%H7910><s%>
